channel.title: Technote on Thomas Chester's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Technote on Thomas Chester's Blog

item.title: Lost Disk Space to Fuslogvw
item.description: This post will discuss a recent problem I encountered when installing Visual Studio 2015 (although the actual software being installed does not matter). During the installation process, the 250GB drive in my computer ran out of space.

item.title: Disable Google Chrome Updates [Updated]
item.description: In this article we look at using the Administative Template in ADMX format for Windows 7 and later. The original article, Disable Google Chrome Updates, used the Administrative Template in ADM format for versions of Windows prior to Windows 7.

item.title: Fixing Windows Update Error 0x80072F8F
item.description: The posts discusses a method of addressing Windows Update error 0x80072F8F in the context of SCCM and non-domain joined machines.

item.title: Regain Access to SQL Server When Locked Out
item.description: This post describes how to regain access to a SQL server when you are denied access and the sa password has been lost.

item.title: SQL Server 2012 Restore Error
item.description: This post describes an error that may occur when you are transferring database backup files from a SQL 2008 server to a SQL 2012 server and you are using SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) to perform the restores.

item.title: Dell PowerEdge OpenManage Firmware Notice
item.description: This brief note talks about how to turn off the Dell OpenManage disk firmware and driver checks.

item.title: Dell PowerEdge Degraded Backplane Error
item.description: This brief note talks about an issue I encountered with the Dell OpenManage agents after replacing a failed disk.

item.title: Disable Google Chrome Updates
item.description: Google publishes information on how to disable the automatic updating of Chrome on Windows machines via group policy. That information is not easily to locate on Google’s site, so this article will distill that information into an easily referenced procedure.

item.title: Monitoring RabbitMQ Hosted on Microsoft Windows
item.description: This post will discuss how to monitor a Windows hosted RabbitMQ installation from a Linux based Zenoss monitor using the RabbitMQ plugin.

item.title: PowerShell Tips - Remote Maintenance Helpers
item.description: This article contains some PowerShell tips that I have found to be useful for performing maintenance on computers in remote offices.

item.title: Fedora Fails to Boot After Install
item.description: In this post I discuss a fatal bug that I ran into while installing Fedora 20.

item.title: Create a Debian Bootable Install Disk
item.description: In this post I discuss how to create a bootable USB disk on Mac OS X for the Debian “Testing” network installer.

item.title: Error Running SQL 2012 Best Practice Analyzer
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to address a permissions problem when attempting to run the SQL Server 2012 Best Practice Analyzer.

item.title: Class Not Registered Error Using Excel Connection Manager
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to address a “Class Not Registered Error” when using a Microsoft Excel Connection Manager in a SSIS package.

item.title: Designer Stops Working in BIDS
item.description: This post describes how to fix the Business Intelligence Development Studio 2008 error that occurs when trying to view the design surface of a SSIS package.

item.title: Transaction Response Timeout from Service Manager
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to address a timeout error that occurs during a service startup.

item.title: SQL Server Alias Registry Settings
item.description: In this post we will discuss where SQL Server Aliases, defined through the SQL Server Configuration Manager, are stored in the Windows registry.

item.title: SQL Server Database Mirroring Troubleshooting Notes
item.description: In this post we will highlight a collection of troubleshooting notes related to SQL Server database mirroring.

item.title: SQL Server Database Mirroring Failover Notes
item.description: In this post we will highlight some techniques on executing a failover when using SQL Server database mirroring.

item.title: Failed to Communicate with Debug Host Process in BIDS
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to fix the “cannot communicate with the debug host process” error when trying to debug SQL Server Integration Services projects using the Business Intelligence Development Studio (BIDS).

item.title: ConvertStringSidToSid Error from the Volume Shadow Copy Service
item.description: In this post we discuss how to fix the ConvertStringSidToSid error from the Volume Shadow Copy Service.

item.title: Entity Framework Error When Calling SaveChanges Method
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to address a potential transaction error when calling the SaveChanges method on an Entity Framework context variable.

item.title: Unable to Connect to Remote SQL Server Integration Services
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to address an “Access Is Denied” error when trying to connect to a remote instance SQL Server Integration Services.

item.title: Failed to Change SQL Agent Job Ownership
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to address a typical error when trying to reassign SQL Agent job ownership.

item.title: Failed to Acquire Excel Connection Manager
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to address an “OLE DB error … failed to acquire connection” when using a Microsoft Excel Connection Manager in a SSIS package.
